title: Where do recorded games go?
body: I'm in a past game and I recorded a part of the game, but have no idea where the recordings go. Where do they go? Thanks!

replies.body: Another question, how do I upload these files so everyone can see them? Any suggestions on where to do this?

Per the [Replays ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips)guide, highlights should be available through:

C:\Users\\Documents\LeagueofLegends\Highlights

Any replays you'd like to watch would be available through your profile's match history in-game as long as it's on the same patch.  I hope that helps!
